attributes.action: Stop cotebrook home from closing start giving them the help/funding they need
attributes.additional_details: Staff and residents will be really upset if the home has to close all of the staff will lose the jobs they love doing and the residents will lose there home and be split up and placed else were local authorities and the goverment need to get behind this and start helping and giving the support and funding needed so they have a chance of being able to stay open
attributes.background: Cotebrook home Is under threat of closure due to lack of funding and help 1 of the residents has been here for over 50 years so this place really is home to them all of the staff and residents are like 1 big family and it is not right that they are under threat of closure

rejection.details:
As far as we can tell, Cotebrook House is privately run, and not operated by local or central government. 

If you want the UK Government or Parliament to amend the law on how care homes are funded or regulated, or if you want Parliament to debate care home closures, you could submit a petition on that issue.
